title.value: Deep learning-based automatic segmentation of rectal tumors in endoscopy images
title.justification: The title reflects the main focus of the research paper, which is developing a deep learning model for segmenting rectal tumors.
title.quote: PO-1632 deep learning-based automatic segmentation of rectal tumors in endoscopy images

extractions.description: The study aims to develop a deep learning model for the automatic segmentation of rectal tumors in endoscopy images, considering inter-observer variability in annotating these images.

type.justification: The paper involves experimenting with a deep learning model for segmentation tasks, involving data collection, model training, and evaluation.
type.quote: A deep learning model was trained with all annotators’ labels simultaneously to perform pixel-wise ...

name.justification: The research deals with imaging techniques in a medical context, specifically endoscopy images and deep learning for image segmentation.
name.quote: ...deep learning-based automatic segmentation of rectal tumors in endoscopy images...

name.justification: The paper's methodology heavily relies on deep learning techniques for segmentation.
name.quote: deep learning-based segmentation model for rectal tumors in endoscopy images.
